description:
Mesa 24.1 open-source graphics stack is now available for download with explicit sync for Vulkan X11 WSI, as well as other new features. Here's what's new!

The post Mesa 24.1 Linux Graphics Stack Released with Vulkan Explicit Sync Support appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Mesa 24.1 Linux Graphics Stack Released with Vulkan Explicit Sync Support

description:
Alpine Linux 3.20 distribution is now available for download with Linux kernel 6.6 LTS, initial support for 64-bit RISC-V, GNOME 46, KDE Plasma 6, and more. Here's what's new!

The post Alpine Linux 3.20 Released with Initial Support for 64-Bit RISC-V, KDE Plasma 6 appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Alpine Linux 3.20 Released with Initial Support for 64-Bit RISC-V, KDE Plasma 6
